\n\nFadlan Soo noqoshada waa 14 cisho"}]
html:
PATIENT LAB PRESCRIPTIPON

PRESCRIPTION

ID: {{doc.patient}}

Age: {{frappe.db.get_value("Patient",doc.patient,"p_age")}}

Doctor: {{doc.practitioner_name}}

Name: {{doc.patient_name}}

sex: {{doc.patient_sex}}

Date: {{doc.encounter_date}}

{% for lab in doc.lab_test_prescription %} {% endfor %}
No Lab Test Name Comment
{{lab.idx}} {{lab.lab_test_name}} {{lab.lab_test_comment or ''}}

Signature: ________________________

Hodan District, Banadir ,Digfeer Road www.royalhospital.so info@royalhospital.so 0611222265
name: Lab Prescription
